comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Great building, still there on Broad at Roseneath. They got rid of Edsel and moved "up" to Rambler/American Motors.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Meyer went from Kaiser-Frazier to Hudson to Edsel to AMC. They probably pined for the stability of a Studebaker franchise.

comment.author: 10212281@N03
comment._content: Is this the building now? I took this a few years ago. If so, the glass seems to be straight now rather than angled as in the '50s.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: That looks like the same building Edsel.  The glass was just recently changed.  MAACO paints cars in there, and you can see them working from the street
